turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a pizza for dinner.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want two large pizzas from Marco's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Two large pizzas. Got it. What would you like on them?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want one with all pepperoni, and one with half mushroom, half pineapple.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Two large pizzas, one all pepperoni, one half mushroom, half pineapple. Would you like any appetizers or desserts?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you, just the pizzas will be fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want me to check for any sales or coupons?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm sorry, no coupons are available. Would you like to add anything else to your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, I think I want some breadsticks. Can you look up their options?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your regular Marco's only has one option: cheesy breadsticks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. I'll have an order of those.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any special dipping sauces?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. So to confirm, that's two large pizzas. One with pepperoni, and one half mushroom, half pineapple. And an order of cheesy bread.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds right. Please add a special note for delivery.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes sir. Your order is complete and should be available in about 25 minutes. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. Let me know how the pizza tastes.
